TopicTitle: Kerbalinian Odyssey A Kerbal series - Dramatization of the Kerbals story

Articles.Content:
This is my series I wanted to do in a long time, the first episode is a transition from a lets play to a story theme show.

The story is for the Kerbals to re-build their space program to be able to rescue three stranded kerbals on Duna while they are on a mysterious mission, searching for something the location of which was show to them be an artifact found on the north pole of Kerbin. Oh yes and there are bad guys called the 'Keep Kerbals On Kerbin society' or K.O.K. for short.
